title: Google publishes new puzzle for revealing I/O 2022 information
content:
Google I/O is a yearly event targeted mainly at developers, which is usually where we get our first good look at the yearly Android release and (occasionally) upcoming hardware products. Google usually creates a puzzle or teaser that leads to revealing the dates for I/O, and now the puzzle for I/O 2022 is live. The

The post Google publishes new puzzle for revealing I/O 2022 information appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is following its yearly tradition of revealing the dates for its Google I/O live event with a complex puzzle.
